title: EMI-Based University STEM Education Instructional Design Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary STEM knowledge and intermediate or higher English proficiency
context.additional_context: STEM education conducted in an EMI (English Medium Instruction) environment combining student-centered strategies and translanguaging. Practical learning environments are established using VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can engage in English academic discourse for STEM subjects in EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) environments
Learners can understand and express multidisciplinary content using translanguaging strategies
Learners can collaboratively perform real-world STEM problem-solving processes through VR simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
